oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Aerial photograph of interstate construction near Hadley Park, circa 1968
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Aerial photograph looking west toward Hadley Park, showing interstate highway construction nearby, circa 1968, taken by Metro Photographer, William M. King. The park is at the top center of the photograph. Ground has been cleared in between 27th and 28th Avenues North, and Albion and Alameda Streets. Houses are visible in the foreground, middle right, and distant left. Forms part of the Nashville Room Historic Photographs Collection. 1 photograph : b & w ; 8 x 10 in.
Interstate 40 would pass near this location when it was built between 1968 and 1971.
